chapter.title: Localization
chapter.para: PDF Editor is run in english language by default, but by setting environment variable LANG before launching the program, you can tell PDF Editor to look for specific language file. If the localization you requested is not available, english will be used instead.

Aside default english, these localizations are available:
cs - Czech
de - German
es - Spanish
ru - Russian
fr - French
zh_TW - Chinese (traditional)
